Translations.Text: Neither Zid nor Christians accept ona ona nasledovat ich nabozenstvo. Say GOD's guidance je true guidance. ona acquiesce ich zelat znalost ona received ona nie zalozit ally supporter pomoc ona GOD
Those received scripture zauzlit it mat rad it zauzlit verit v this! Mat rad for those disbelieve they bol losers
O Dieta Izrael zapamatat si Moj favor ja bestowed ona ze ja zehnat ona inak than any inaksie zaludnit
Beware z dni when ziaden soul pomoc iny soul nie ransom nie accepted intercession bol useful ziaden 1 pomoc
Recall lenze Abraham put test jeho Lord certain commands he fulfilled them! God said ja appointing ona imam ludia. He said i moj descendants? He said Moj covenant nie zapocitat transgressors

(My rendered shrine Ka aba) focal point ludia safe sanctuary. Ona pouzivat Abraham's shrine mat rad prayer dom. My zmocnit Abraham Ismail Ona purify Moj dom those visit those zit there those bow prostrate

Abraham prayed Moj Lord robit this peaceful zem zadovazit its ludia ovocie! Zadovazit for those verit v GOD Posledny Dni. God said ja robit i zadovazit for those disbelieve! Ja let them enjoy temporarily potom commit them retribution Hell chudobny destiny
